title: Storing Key-Value Pairs with Rust Hash Maps
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of hash maps and how they can be used to store keys with associated values.

meta.title: Storing Keys with Associated Values in Hash Maps
meta.description: Learn how to use Rust hash maps to store key-value pairs and look up data by key.
meta.keywords: data structures, rust playground, hash maps, rust tutor, rust online compiler, key value pairs, rust commands, rust practice, rust online, rust online playground
